description: Number of partitions of n into parts 8k+4 or 8k+6.
formula: If n is even, a(n) ~ exp(Pi*sqrt(n/6)) * Gamma(3/4) / (2 * 6^(3/8) * Pi^(1/4) * n^(7/8)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 27 2015
mathematica: nmax = 100; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(8k+4))*(1 - x^(8k+6))), {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 27 2015 *)
